name: Reputeka
tag_list: ecommerce, artisans, craftsman, handmade-product, made-in-italy, luxury
overview:
Reputeka is a new portal created to increase the visibility of Italian artisan enterprises.

The companies that take part in Reputeka have the opportunity to make use of an online “shop window” and to sell their own products via the internet. Fundamental, Reputeka is the first site in Italy that is equipped to evaluate the reputation of the companies in a “super partes” manner. In order to do this, Reputeka does not accept advertisements from the companies that are associated with the site. In this way, there is no conflict of interest, and a company reputation’s will positively correlated with its evaluation effectuated by clients that will purchase and use its products. However, the size of the company and its ability to invest in advertising will not count toward its reputation.

Only the quality of a company’s products will count toward its reputation. Reputeka is also the first site in Italy that intends to make the small, less-known artisan enterprises very visible to the masses. In the valleys and on the mountains of the Italian province are hidden treasures of the artisan tradition of our country.

Handmade products that are planned and designed patiently that deserve to be appreciated and evaluated in all of their preciousness and uniqueness. It is to these products that Reputeka wants to give clear visibility across the web. For this, Reputeka assists the artisan by offering a turnkey web management service, from the creation of the image on the site to the management of the online sales of the products, shipping included, in exchange for a compensation proportional to the value of the transaction.
